name: Hell Hound
languages: understands Infernal but can't speak it

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The hound exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
